1:
Out of the depths I cry to you, Yahweh.
\q
3:
If you, Yahweh, would mark iniquities,
\q Lord, who could stand?
\q
4:
But there is forgiveness with you,
\q that you may be revered.
5:
I wait for Yahweh, my soul waits,
\q and in his word I hope.
\q
6:
My soul waits for the Lord
\q more than watchmen wait for the morning.
7:
Israel, hope in Yahweh.
\q Yahweh is merciful,
\q and he is very willing to forgive.
\q
8:
It is he who will redeem Israel
\q from all his sins.
